quote: Food is symbolic of love when words are inadequate.
author: Alan D. Wolfelt

quote: One cannot think well, love well, sleep well, if one has not dined well.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: We all eat, and it would be a sad waste of opportunity to eat badly.
author: Anna Thomas

quote: You don't need a silver fork to eat good food.
author: Paul Prudhomme

quote: Laughter is brightest where food is best.
author: Irish Proverb

quote: Cooking is like love. It should be entered into with abandon or not at all.
author: Harriet Van Horne

quote: The only thing I like better than talking about food is eating.
author: John Walters

quote: Food is our common ground, a universal experience.
author: James Beard

quote: People who love to eat are always the best people.
author: Julia Child

quote: The secret of success in life is to eat what you like and let the food fight it out inside.
author: Mark Twain

quote: There is no sincerer love than the love of food.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Food is the most primitive form of comfort.
author: Sheilah Graham Westbrook

quote: Tell me what you eat, and I will tell you what you are.
author: Jean Anthelme Brillat-Savarin

quote: First we eat, then we do everything else.
author: M.F.K. Fisher

quote: Good food ends with good talk.
author: Geoffrey Neighor

quote: Life is uncertain. Eat dessert first.
author: Ernestine Ulmer

quote: If you really want to make a friend, go to someone's house and eat with him... The people who give you their food give you their heart.
author: Cesar Chavez

quote: Food brings people together on many different levels. It’s nourishment of the soul and body; it’s truly love.
author: Giada De Laurentiis

quote: The shared meal elevates eating from a mechanical process of fueling the body to a ritual of family and community.
author: Michael Pollan

quote: Good food is the foundation of genuine happiness.
author: Auguste Escoffier

quote: To eat is a necessity, but to eat intelligently is an art.
author: François de La Rochefoucauld

quote: One of the very nicest things about life is the way we must regularly stop whatever it is we are doing and devote our attention to eating.
author: Luciano Pavarotti

quote: Cooking is one of the strongest ceremonies for life.
author: Laura Esquivel
